entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
